pages.text: $(li)Crocodiles are hostile long green body covered in scales with sharp teeth mouths creatures that can be found in the Swamps and Rivers of the Overworld.$(br)$(li)You can bred them with Rotten Flesh.$(br)$(li)After breeding, Crocodiles will come ashore to lay their eggs.
$(li)When a baby crocodile becomes an adult or on the death of an Adult Crocodile, they may drop Crocodile Scutes.
